description:
Two years after the war with the http://anidb.net/ch96930 [Liberation Army], http://anidb.net/ch99125 [Shinpachi] encounters a child who initially seems to be his daughter, as she refers to him as her father. The `child`, Tamako, turns out to be an android. http://anidb.net/ch49588 [Kintoki] reveals that a copy of http://anidb.net/ch7827 [Tama]`s data was placed in Tamako, but she does not possess any of Tama`s memories.
Source: Gintama Wiki
name: Tamako
